name: PULSE CLINIC Singapore | A Lifestyle Clinic

reviews.text: Riff was very reassuring and really helped to ensure that the experience there was comfortable and non judgemental. He makes the patient feel very comfortable and kudos to him for the great experience he provided. Will come back and recommend those to come over and get their needs tested and done here!
A very friendly and warm doctor! Dr Jeremiah answered all my questions and give me good advise. Love this clinic. It a safe space.

The facility was clean, and the staff were friendly. Everything was quick and smooth.

I needed a quick consultation with a doctor and got to meet the doctor in no time. The staff and the doctor seemed to have a really good understanding of men's health and were super helpful during my appointment.
Very experienced doctor with hormonal issues. I love the friendliness and empathy of Dr Jeremiah

My son, Adiy recently underwent circumcision surgery and I wanted to share my experience to help others who may be considering the procedure.

The actual surgery itself doesn't went smoothly as Adiy was terrified upon entering the room, but I was pleasantly surprised by how quick Dr Taufiq and his his team handled and convinced Adiy to undergo the procedure. The medical team made sure to keep Adiy comfortable and informed throughout the entire process, which helped alleviate any anxiety Adiy had about the surgery.

After the surgery, Adiy experienced some discomfort and swelling, which is to be expected. However, with proper pain management and following the aftercare instructions provided by Dr Taufiq, the recovery process was manageable.

It’s important to note that everyone’s experience with circumcision surgery will be different, and it’s crucial to follow your doctor’s advice and attend follow-up appointments to ensure proper healing.

Overall, I’m pleased with Dr Taufiq circumcision surgery procedure, and I’m grateful for the support and care I've received from Dr Taufiq. If you’re considering the procedure, I encourage you to thoroughly research and speak with a healthcare professional to determine if it’s the right choice for you.
